Header: Head of female discovered near the Bolgoda bridge
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The head of an unidentified female was discovered near the Bolgoda Bridge close to the Ratnapura – Panadura main road. Police said that security has been deployed in the area until a Magisterial inquiry is conducted into the matter. The head was discovered based on information received by the Bandaragama Police this morning (November 04).
